      • getCharset

        public static Charset getCharset​(Metadata parseMeta)
        Try to get HTML encoding from parse metadata. Try Nutch.CHAR_ENCODING_FOR_CONVERSION, then HttpHeaders.CONTENT_ENCODING then fallback StandardCharsets.UTF_8
        Parameters:
        parseMeta - a populated Metadata
        Returns:
        Charset
